Package pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object
Represents class Piece, the abstract superclass for all of the chess pieces
Author:
Benjamin Lee, Christopher Shen

  • Constructor Details

    • Piece

      public Piece(char color, int file, int rank, String pieceName)
      Parameters:
      color - A char representing which color is moving a piece
      file - An int representing the file number of the piece
      rank - An int representing the rank number of the piece
      pieceName - A String representing the name of the piece

  • Method Details

    • validMovement

      public abstract boolean validMovement(Piece[][] board, int movingFile, int movingRank, int landingFile, int landingRank, char color)
      Parameters:
      board - A 2D array of Pieces representing the entire chess board
      movingFile - An int representing the file number of the starting position of the piece that is moving
      movingRank - An int representing the rank number of the starting position of the piece that is moving
      landingFile - An int representing the file number of the destination of the piece that is moving
      landingRank - An int representing the rank number of the destination of the piece that is moving
      color - A char representing which color is moving a piece
      Returns:
      Returns true if the attempted move is valid

    • getThreats

      public abstract void getThreats(Piece[][] board, boolean[][] threats, int file, int rank)
      Parameters:
      board - A 2D array of Pieces representing the entire chess board
      threats - A 2D array of booleans representing threats to the opponenets pieces
      file - An int representing the file number of the piece
      rank - An int representing the rank number of the piece

    • possibleMoves

      public abstract ArrayList<List<Integer>> possibleMoves(Piece[][] board, boolean[][] threats, int file, int rank)
      Parameters:
      board - A 2D array of Pieces representing the entire chess board
      threats - A 2D array of booleans representing threats to the opponenets pieces
      file - An int representing the file number of the piece
      rank - An int representing the rank number of the piece
      Returns:
      Returns an Arraylist of all the possible moves that the specified piece can move to
